metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45293 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in Binaryen 103 due to an Invalid memory address dereference in wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::visitLet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binaryen - 108-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binaryen package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '108-1').
